thread.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai’s father-in-law remarries at 70
thread.title_full: Google CEO Sundar Pichai’s father-in-law remarries at 70 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai’s father-in-law remarries at 70
text:
Other Articles Letters to the editor Donald Trump backs Russia, Iran efforts to fight Islamic State Media not allowed in HC during hearing of Hardik Patel's petition Google Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Sundar Pichai’s father-in-law, Olaram Haryani, remarried at the age of 70 here today.
Olaram, a widower, married 65-year-old Madhuri Sharma, a resident of Civil Lines area in Kota city. Sharma was a widow. The marriage was solemnized through Arya Samaj custom.
Olaram, a retired employee of a Government Polytechnic College in Kota, lives in Mumbai. His two children – a son and a daughter – live abroad. His daughter Anjali is wife of Pichai.
After the marriage ceremony, Olaram had this to say, “Everyone has a right to lead his life freely as per his/her wish, said.”
 29, 2015 11:22 pm
